author: bago
msg: ReferenceCounter has no reference to MimeMessageCopyOnWriteProxy, we better declare it static.

author: afester
msg: LOGCXX-35: Cleaned up the configurations scripts to eliminate detection of libxml2, removed setting of the various HAVE_XML defines.

author: bago
msg: Make use of MimeMessageCopyOnWriteProxy and not MimeMessageWrapper when working with messages: MimeMessageWrapper should never be used directly.
